Description.Text: Alarus Hotel is a 4 star hotel, located in one of the visitors` favourite parts of Odessa. Famous Deribasovskaya Street and the Opera House are located within 1.5 km away. The hotel is suitable for those looking for comfortable accommodation and high standard services at acceptable rates. This building has 20 rooms, each room is equipped with climate control system, a plasma Tv set, a desk and a telephone. There is a restaurant on the upper floor of the hotel where guests can enjoy a meal and the bar offers various snacks and drinks.
